name: 100 Days without delays
description:
In this Match3 game you have to help the young heroine Lee Milton manage her task to setup a successful new airport in a neighboring state - in mere 100 days! Collect three colorful items in a row, upgrade the airport, even help police to solve the crime, and she will become the youngest airport manager in a company’s history!

- 100 game levels!
- 30 building upgrades!
- Captivating story
- "Moves", "countdown", and "relaxed" playing modes!
- Fillable boosters!
- Square matches!
